Text: and by the night when it covers with darkness,
your Rabb has neither forsaken you, O Muhammad, nor is He\n\t\t\tdispleased.
Certainly the later period shall be better for you than the\n\t\t\tearlier.
Soon your Rabb shall grant you something with which you will be\n\t\t\twell-pleased.
Did He not find you an orphan and give you shelter?
Did He not find you lost and gave you guidance?
Did He not find you poor and made you self-sufficient?
Therefore, do not treat the orphan with harshness
and do not chide away the beggar,
and rehearse the bounty of your Rabb.
